contents.text: Thank you for calling Workday in San Francisco, your cloud partner for SaaS-based human resources and financial management solutions.
To learn about our human resources solutions and employee engagement tools, press 1.
To speak with an HR solutions specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an HR solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss improving team engagement using your HR solutions.
I want to talk to HR about veteran hiring programs and workplace accommodations.
I want to review HRAPI integration for real-time employee engagement analytics with an HR solutions specialist.
I need step-by-step guidance from an HR specialist on how to update my emergency contact information in the employee portal.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your HR employee engagement tools.

contents.text: To speak with a financial management specialist, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a financial management specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to review your financial management and reporting features for our quarterly close.
I need help rolling over my military Thrift Savings Plan into my company retirement account.
I need guidance on configuring the Workday Financials ledger and budgeting modules with a finance specialist.
I want help enrolling in direct deposit and viewing my retirement account statements through the financial management system.
I want to discuss financial reporting and budget planning modules with a specialist.

contents.text: For customer support, payroll, and benefits assistance, press 2.
For employee benefits, engagement, and payroll questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our employee benefits team.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up benefits enrollment for new hires.
I have questions about adding my VA healthcare benefits to the company health plan.
I have discrepancies in payroll processing and need help troubleshooting benefits enrollment workflows.
I need to ask the benefits team how to add my spouse to my health insurance plan and understand my coverage details.
I need information on enrolling in benefits and managing payroll deductions for my student stipend.

contents.text: For technical support and system issues, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I'm experiencing errors accessing the system and need technical support.
I’m locked out of my Workday account and need assistance resetting my password.
I’m encountering a SAML SSO authentication error in Workday and need technical support.
I’m locked out of my Workday account and need assistance resetting my password to regain access.
I’m experiencing an error submitting expense reports and need technical support.
